about_the_game:
This package contains 26 musics by Robin Dussart and Dimitri Guindet

Tracklist:
01 - Intro
02 - Lasergrid 1986
03 - Digital Supremacy
04 - Deep Packet Extermination
05 - His Name Is Heavy
06 - Convolutional Neural Network
07 - Analog Workstation
08 - Ghost In The Machine
09 - Robothorium
10 - Constant Shift
11 - Motherboard
12 - Bill Silver Is Back
13 - Stack Overflow
14 - Assembly Line
15 - Awakening
16 - Backpropagation
17 - Operating System Online
18 - Beyond The Void
19 - Deadlock
20 - Happiness In Slavery
21 - Encrypted Data
22 - Generative Adversarial Networks
23 - War Is Coming
24 - Polynomial Kernel
25 - Trailer Version
26 - Polynomial Kernel (Alternate Version)

fullgame.name: S.A.I.A.'s Awakening: A Robothorium Visual Novel

legal_notice:
Game developed and published by Goblinz Studio SAS (France).

The chinese version is published by WhisperGames in all regions of China, Taiwan,Macao, Hongkong...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512Mb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro, NVIDIA GTX 660 Ti, or AMD Radeon HD 7870 w/ 1024 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Robothorium Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 440 or AMD Radeon HD 5550 w/ 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 10 compliant graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
